"Shoon" was the name shared by a group of individuals making up the infamous Shoon Dynasty. Individuals named "Shoon" include
* Akkabar Shoon the Elder
* Akkabar Shoon the Younger
* Amahl Shoon I
* Amahl Shoon II
* Amahl Shoon III
* Amahl Shoon IV
* Amahl Shoon V
* Amahl Shoon VI
* Amahl Shoon VII
* Shoon I
* Shoon II
* Shoon III
* Shoon IV
* Shoon V
* Shoon VI
* Shoon VII
